text: “Iindlela (zokufikelela) emazulwini, ndikwazi nokuba ndibone uThixo kaMûsâ: kodwa inene mna ndimcingela ukuba (uMûsâ) lixoki.” Kwenziwa kwabonakala kulungile emehlweni kaFir’awn ukungcola kwezenzo zakhe yaye waye wathintelwa ukuba angangeni eNdleleni elungileyo; kananjalo icebo likaFir’awn alizanga likhokelele ntweni ngaphandle kwelahleko nentshabalalo
